languages.text: "Хватит, ксенос! Повторяя одно и то же, ты не убедишь меня в своей смехотворной лжи. Вольный Торговец верит тебе на слово — это {mf|его|ее} порок и ересь, не мои. И пока я не получу более весомых доказательств измены Ахиллеаса Скаландра, чем твой лепет, я не сменю своего мнения. Ни сейчас, ни потом".

"Enough, xenos! Repeating the same thing over and over will not convince me of your ridiculous lies. The Rogue Trader takes you at your word — that is {mf|his|her} vice and heresy, not mine. And until I have more solid proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than your prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."
languages.original_text: "Хватит, ксенос! Повторяя одно и то же, ты не убедишь меня в своей смехотворной лжи. Вольный Торговец верит тебе на слово — это {mf|его|ее} порок и ересь, не мои. И пока я не получу более весомых доказательств измены Ахиллеаса Скаландра, чем твой лепет, я не сменю своего мнения. Ни сейчас, ни потом".

The Rogue Trader takes you at your word — that is {mf|his|her} vice and heresy, not mine. And until I have more solid proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than your prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

The Rogue Trader takes you at your word — that is {mf|his|her} vice and heresy, not mine. And until I have more solid proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than your prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「もういい、異種族め！同じことを何度も繰り返しても、我はお前のふざけた嘘にだまされんぞ。自由開拓者がお前の言葉を信じるなら…それは、奴の悪徳にして異端行為だ。我には関係ない。お前のおしゃべりより信頼に足る、アキレアス・スカランダーの反逆の証拠を見つけるまでは、考えを変えるつもりはない。それは今も、これからもだ」
languages.original_text: "Enough, xenos! Repeating the same thing over and over will not convince me of your ridiculous lies. The Rogue Trader takes you at your word — that is {mf|his|her} vice and heresy, not mine. And until I have more solid proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than your prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: 「もういい、異種族め！同じことを何度も繰り返しても、我はお前のふざけた嘘にだまされんぞ。自由開拓者がお前の言葉を信じるなら…それは、奴の悪徳にして異端行為だ。我には関係ない。お前のおしゃべりより信頼に足る、アキレアス・スカランダーの反逆の証拠を見つけるまでは、考えを変えるつもりはない。それは今も、これからもだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “够了，异形！谎言重复一千次也不会成真。行商浪人愿意相信你的话，不过是因为{mf|他|她}道德腐化，心志不坚罢了，我和{mf|他|她}可不一样。除非能找到铁证，证明阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德的背叛行为，否则不要妄想我会相信这一派胡言。我现在不会相信，未来也不会相信。”
languages.original_text: "Enough, xenos! Repeating the same thing over and over will not convince me of your ridiculous lies. The Rogue Trader takes you at your word — that is {mf|his|her} vice and heresy, not mine. And until I have more solid proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than your prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: “够了，异形！谎言重复一千次也不会成真。行商浪人愿意相信你的话，不过是因为{mf|他|她}道德腐化，心志不坚罢了，我和{mf|他|她}可不一样。除非能找到铁证，证明阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德的背叛行为，否则不要妄想我会相信这一派胡言。我现在不会相信，未来也不会相信。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Assez, xénos ! Vous ne me convaincrez pas en répétant sans cesse vos mensonges ridicules. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} vous croit sur parole ; c'est là son vice et son hérésie, mais il en va différemment de moi. Et je ne changerai pas d'avis tant que je n'aurai pas obtenu une preuve plus tangible de la trahison d'Achilleas Scalander que vos racontars. Ni maintenant, ni jamais. »
languages.original_text: "Enough, xenos! Repeating the same thing over and over will not convince me of your ridiculous lies. The Rogue Trader takes you at your word — that is {mf|his|her} vice and heresy, not mine. And until I have more solid proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than your prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: « Assez, xénos ! Vous ne me convaincrez pas en répétant sans cesse vos mensonges ridicules. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} vous croit sur parole ; c'est là son vice et son hérésie, mais il en va différemment de moi. Et je ne changerai pas d'avis tant que je n'aurai pas obtenu une preuve plus tangible de la trahison d'Achilleas Scalander que vos racontars. Ni maintenant, ni jamais. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ya basta, xenos! Repetir lo mismo una y otra vez no me convencerá de tus ridículas mentiras. Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente te toma la palabra, allá {mf|él|ella} con sus herejías. Pero hasta que tenga mejores pruebas de la traición de Achilleas Scalander que no sean meras habladurías, no cambiaré de opinión. Ni ahora, ni nunca».
languages.original_text: "Enough, xenos! Repeating the same thing over and over will not convince me of your ridiculous lies. The Rogue Trader takes you at your word — that is {mf|his|her} vice and heresy, not mine. And until I have more solid proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than your prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ya basta, xenos! Repetir lo mismo una y otra vez no me convencerá de tus ridículas mentiras. Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente te toma la palabra, allá {mf|él|ella} con sus herejías. Pero hasta que tenga mejores pruebas de la traición de Achilleas Scalander que no sean meras habladurías, no cambiaré de opinión. Ni ahora, ni nunca».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Genug, Xenos! Dieselbe Sache ständig zu wiederholen, wird mich nicht von Euren lächerlichen Lügen überzeugen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} nimmt Euch beim Wort ... das ist {mf|seine|ihre} Sünde und Ketzerei, nicht meine. Und solange ich keinen besseren Beweis für Achilleas Scalanders Verrat habe, als Euer Geschwätz, werde ich meine Meinung nicht ändern. Jetzt nicht und auch in Zukunft nicht."
languages.original_text: "Enough, xenos! Repeating the same thing over and over will not convince me of your ridiculous lies. The Rogue Trader takes you at your word — that is {mf|his|her} vice and heresy, not mine. And until I have more solid proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than your prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: "Genug, Xenos! Dieselbe Sache ständig zu wiederholen, wird mich nicht von Euren lächerlichen Lügen überzeugen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} nimmt Euch beim Wort ... das ist {mf|seine|ihre} Sünde und Ketzerei, nicht meine. Und solange ich keinen besseren Beweis für Achilleas Scalanders Verrat habe, als Euer Geschwätz, werde ich meine Meinung nicht ändern. Jetzt nicht und auch in Zukunft nicht."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yeter zeno! Aynı saçma yalanı kırk kere de tekrarlasan beni inandıramazsın. Hür Tacir sözüne güveniyor... Bu onun kendi günahkârlığı, kendi kâfirliğidir... Beni bağlamaz. Boş laflarını kanıttan saymıyorum, Achilleas Scalander'ın ihanetinin kanıtını bulana kadar da kararımdan dönmeyeceğim. Ne şimdi, ne de asla."
languages.original_text: "Enough, xenos! Repeating the same thing over and over will not convince me of your ridiculous lies. The Rogue Trader takes you at your word — that is {mf|his|her} vice and heresy, not mine. And until I have more solid proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than your prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: "Yeter zeno! Aynı saçma yalanı kırk kere de tekrarlasan beni inandıramazsın. Hür Tacir sözüne güveniyor... Bu onun kendi günahkârlığı, kendi kâfirliğidir... Beni bağlamaz. Boş laflarını kanıttan saymıyorum ve Achilleas Scalander'ın ihanetinin kanıtını bulana kadar da kararımı değiştirmem. Ne şimdi, ne de asla."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
